label: Delvare, Gérard & Jean-bernard Huchet.  2017. Brachymeria mochica, a new Neotropical species of Chalcididae  (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea) discovered on the archaeological site of  Huacas de Moche, Peru with a review of related species . Zootaxa 4290(1): 43–60.
value: Delvare, Gérard & Jean-bernard Huchet.  2017. Brachymeria mochica, a new Neotropical species of Chalcididae  (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea) discovered on the archaeological site of  Huacas de Moche, Peru with a review of related species . Zootaxa 4290(1): 43–60.
title: Brachymeria mochica, a new Neotropical species of Chalcididae (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea) discovered on the archaeological site of Huacas de Moche, Peru with a review of related species
